title: Some States Grant NaturopathsThe Power to Write Prescriptions
author: Andrea PetersenStaff Reporter
cleaned_text: Aug. 22, 2002 6:17 pm ET Naturopathic doctors, who may use myrrh for high cholesterol and a garlic solution for ear infections, are increasingly gaining the power to perform procedures traditionally reserved for medical doctors.
